quote: Writing a story about a place calls that world into existence. Sometimes, as the author, you accompany it for a while. But even as you write, the characters have minds of their own.
quote_letters: WRITING A STORY ABOUT A PLACE CALLS THAT WORLD INTO EXISTENCE SOMETIMES AS THE AUTHOR YOU ACCOMPANY IT FOR A WHILE BUT EVEN AS YOU WRITE THE CHARACTERS HAVE MINDS OF THEIR OWN
